column2:
"It’s always unbearable at a moment
like this every time!"

"I'm already very excited just thinking
of the wonderful experience that we
will have this time."

"Hahaha! I think I'm so overly excited.
Makes one wonder who is the senior
here."

"Ok, let me reset and settle down my
emotions. I'll strive to do my best!"

"毎度この瞬間が
たまらないのよねー！"

"今回はどんなスゴい体験ができるのか
もうワクワクしちゃうよ。"

"あはは！　はしゃぎすぎだね。
これじゃどっちが先輩かわかんないよ。"

"ま、初心に返って
がんばってみよー！"
